definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Deaf peple sometimes find it hard to get through to strangers.
sentences.chinese: 聾子有時很難使陌生人理解他們。

sentences.english: But I, as a deaf man, heard not; and I was as a dumb man that openeth not his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 但我如聾子不聽，像啞吧不開口。

sentences.english: Helen Keller became blind and deaf. She couldn't see and she couldn't hear.
sentences.chinese: 海倫凱勒成爲盲人和聾子，他不能看也不能聽。

sentences.english: If the deaf could hear, the blind would be able to see, too.
sentences.chinese: 如果聾子可以聽到，那麼盲人也會能夠看的見了。

sentences.english: But such calls for national unity are falling on deaf ears.
sentences.chinese: 但是這種全國一條心的呼籲正進了聾子耳朵。

sentences.english: Go away, I'm screaming. Haven't you heard?
sentences.chinese: 我對他大叫道，“滾，你是聾子麼？

sentences.english: As far as Jieyu's experience is concerned, you are blind and deaf.
sentences.chinese: 在接輿的經驗層面上，你就是個瞎子，就是聾子。

sentences.english: Beneath (Underneath) the wreath the deaf man near death is out of breath.
sentences.chinese: 花環下面那個快要逝世的聾子喘不外氣來。

sentences.english: It's no use abusing fate, for it is a deaf.
sentences.chinese: 向命運叫罵無濟於事呢，因爲命運是個聾子。

sentences.english: Beneath ( Underneath) the  wreath the  deaf man near death is out of  breath.
sentences.chinese: 花環下面那個快要死的聾子喘不過氣來。

sentences.english: He spoke to me as if I were (was) deaf.
sentences.chinese: 他跟我說話時就象我是聾子似的。

sentences.english: The deaf hear mute said the blind saw loveqiywm. cn.
sentences.chinese: 聾子聞聲啞巴說瞎子看見了愛情。

sentences.english: Kindness is the language that the deaf can hear and the dumb understand.
sentences.chinese: 善良是一種語言，聾子能天見啞巴懂心間。

definition: to make an irrelevant comparison or interpretation (idiom)
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
bell made of copper or bronze
to hate and resent/angry and full of grievances
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
voice change (at puberty)/to alter one's voice (deliberately)/to sound different (when angry etc)
sighing voice, wailing breath (idiom)/to heave deep sighs/to sigh in despair
